name: Scott
bio: With over 15 years of BMW-exclusive experience, Scott founded Bimmer Lifestyle Autocare with a vision to bring factory-level expertise to Kingston's BMW community.

name: Andre
bio: Andre specializes in BMW electronics and diagnostics. His ability to trace complex electrical faults has earned him a reputation as one of the best in the business.

name: Damion
bio: Damion heads our performance division. From ECU tuning to full track builds, he brings an enthusiast's passion and an engineer's precision to every project.
